label: AB4_tP10_103_a_d-001
title: High Temperature NbTe$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
This is the high-temperature phase of NbTe$_{4}$.  Below 520$^\circ$C it transforms into \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4_tP10_124_a_m-001}{a centrosymmetric structure}. 
 Space group $P4cc$ \#103 has no inversion site and allows an arbitary origin for the $z$-axis.  We fix this by setting $z_{1} = 0$ for the niobium site.
